TEXT.S: = Kasuga = Gaga mniq Pingtung Cunjusyang ka alang Kasuga. 342 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 1,125 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 1,098 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 27 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan95%, Amis1%, Bunun0.5%, Rukai0.5%.
